text: Tyrophagus is a genus of mites in the family Acaridae. ==Species== * Tyrophagus casei Oudemans, 1910 * Tyrophagus curvipenis Fain & Fauvel, 1993 * Tyrophagus debrivorus Chinniah & Mohanasundaram, 1996 * Tyrophagus glossinarum Fain, 1985 * Tyrophagus houstoni (Fain, 1986) * Tyrophagus jingdezhenensis Jiang-Zhenta, 1993 * Tyrophagus lini Oudemans, 1924 * Tyrophagus longior (Gervais, 1844) * Tyrophagus mimlongior Jiang, 1993 * Tyrophagus neiswanderi Johnson & Bruce, 1965 * Tyrophagus neotropicus (Oudemans, 1917) * Tyrophagus palmarum Oudemans, 1924 * Tyrophagus perniciosus Zakhvatkin, 1941 * Tyrophagus putrescentiae (Schrank, 1781) * Tyrophagus robertsonae Lynch, 1989 * Tyrophagus savasi Lynch, 1989 * Tyrophagus similis Volgin, 1949 * Tyrophagus tropicus Robertson, 1959 ==References== ==See also== * Cheese mite Category:Acaridae Category:Taxa named by Anthonie Cornelis Oudemans
title: Tyrophagus
